title: Haunted Hospital - Audio Pack
description: 100 + High quality hospital sounds for your game!
longDescription:
Hello there!


This is my Haunted Hospital Audio Pack, here you'll find a lot of sounds that can come in hand in horror situations, the pack is themed by a hospital with ghosts, door slams, bips, breaths, and even monsters!


Here's the full list:


  1. Door_Close_01
  2. Door_Open_01
  3. Female_Cry_01
  4. Female_Cry_02
  5. Female_Cry_03
  6. Ghost_Ambulance_01
  7. Ghost_Ambulance_02
  8. Ghost_Baby_01
  9. Ghost_Baby_02
  10. Ghost_Baby_03
  11. Ghost_Bell_01
  12. Ghost_Far_Away_01
  13. Ghost_Gore_01
  14. Ghost_Hall_01
  15. Ghost_Hall_02
  16. Ghost_Hall_03
  17. Ghost_Hospital_Stretcher_01
  18. Ghost_Kitchen_01
  19. Glass_Break_01
  20. Heavy_Breath_01
  21. Male_Cry_01
  22. Monster_01
  23. Monster_02
  24. Muffled_Bip_01
  25. Radio_01
  26. Raise_Bed_01
  27. Scream_01
  28. Scream_02
  29. Scream_03
  30. Slam_Door_01
  31. Steam_01
  32. Tremor_01
  33. Tremor_02
  34. Tremor_03

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 102

Number of Audio Cues: 102

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is Kingthings Typewriter 2, free distributed for commercial use by 1001 fonts, and the image is from Unsplash, free distributed by Unsplash for commercial use.
